summary: Kristin counts down the days to her high school graduation, when she'll finally get to leave her small town and her manipulative sister behind, for the New York of her dreams. Everything is... See full summary »
cast: Linda Molin|Fanny Ketter|Mathilda von Essen|Adam Lundgren|Antoni Norén Almén|Kristoffer Berglund|Fabian Fourén|Mats Qviström|Jacke Sjödin|Susanne Barklund|Jens Ohlin|Cecilia Callander|Hanna Fahl|Isac Nyström|Lina Hognert|Elise Nevalainen|Jimmie Prahl|Peder Gränsevik|Lennart Frediksson|Lena Becksén|Kurt Dahlberg|Birgitta Tiainen|Angelina Sten|Ida Lundmark|Michael Arvidsson|Sebastian Dypbukt Källman|Lukas Gustafsson|Siri Blomqvist|Rebecca Manhem|Josephine Maxén|Oliver Panzar|Linnéa Näsholm
